Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils

This package contains various utilities, such as the parser and the serializer, used throughout the Idemix library.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Constants Constants that are used in various places and information (such as the version of the library).
GroupParameters Idemix group parameters abstraction.
idemix_asn A standard externalizing representation of arrays of BigInteger, based on ASN.1 BER encoding.
Parser Parsing class, which allows to load XML files specifying things such as issuer keys, credential structures or proof specifications.
Serializer Support to save/load objects from file.
StructureStore Utility class that loads structural information (e.g., credential structures, public keys).
SystemParameters Idemix system parameters.
Utils Set of utilities routines used throughout the library.
XMLSerializer Class for object serialization to XML.
 

Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils Description

This package contains various utilities, such as the parser and the serializer, used throughout the Idemix library. In addition it hosts the system and group parameters.
